document.full_text: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said israel was offering "nothing we can build on" for peace and that without progress he will seek u.n. recognition of palestinian statehood in september.
document.title: abbas says netanyahu offers no hope for peace
lines_and_colors: palestinian president mahmoud abbas said israel was offering "nothing we can build on" for peace and that without progress he will seek u.n. recognition of palestinian statehood in september.
